SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

2025-12-19 02:12:14.172 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t0].[Id], [t0].[ChurnScore], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CustomerId], [t0].[IsDeleted], [t0].[MainReason], [t0].[PredictionDate], [t0].[RecommendedAction], [t0].[RiskLevel], [t0].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT [a].[CustomerId]
    FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a]
    GROUP BY [a].[CustomerId]
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[Id], [t1].[ChurnScore], [t1].[CreatedAt], [t1].[CustomerId], [t1].[IsDeleted], [t1].[MainReason], [t1].[PredictionDate], [t1].[RecommendedAction], [t1].[RiskLevel], [t1].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM (
        SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[ChurnScore], [a0].[CreatedAt], [a0].[CustomerId], [a0].[IsDeleted], [a0].[MainReason], [a0].[PredictionDate], [a0].[RecommendedAction], [a0].[RiskLevel], [a0].[UpdatedAt], ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY [a0].[CustomerId] ORDER BY [a0].[PredictionDate] DESC) AS [row]
        FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a0]
    ) AS [t1]
    WHERE [t1].[row] <= 1
) AS [t0] ON [t].[CustomerId] = [t0].[CustomerId]
2025-12-19 02:12:14.210 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[CustomerId], [c].[Name], [t].[ChurnScore], [t].[RiskLevel], [t].[RecommendedAction]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [a].[ChurnScore], [a].[CustomerId], [a].[PredictionDate], [a].[RecommendedAction], [a].[RiskLevel]
    FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a]
    ORDER BY [a].[PredictionDate] DESC
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Customers] AS [c] ON [t].[CustomerId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[PredictionDate] DESC

    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

2025-12-19 02:12:26.530 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__customerId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

2025-12-19 02:12:27.081 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__customerId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]

    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

2025-12-19 02:12:29.642 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__customerId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]

2025-12-19 02:12:30.739 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__customerId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]

) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

2025-12-19 02:12:31.837 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__customerId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

2025-12-19 02:12:32.396 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__customerId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]

LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]

LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]

LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[City], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[Email], [t].[IsDeleted], [t].[MembershipDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Phone], [t].[Sector], [t].[UpdatedAt], [o].[Id], [o].[CreatedAt], [o].[CustomerId], [o].[IsDeleted], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[OrderNumber], [o].[Status], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UpdatedAt], [i].[Id], [i].[CreatedAt], [i].[CustomerId], [i].[Date], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[Notes], [i].[SentimentScore], [i].[Type], [i].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[City], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Email], [c].[IsDeleted], [c].[MembershipDate], [c].[Name], [c].[Phone], [c].[Sector], [c].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Customers] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[Id] = @__customerId_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Orders] AS [o] ON [t].[Id] = [o].[CustomerId]
LEFT JOIN [Interactions] AS [i] ON [t].[Id] = [i].[CustomerId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [o].[Id]

SELECT [t0].[Id], [t0].[ChurnScore], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CustomerId], [t0].[IsDeleted], [t0].[MainReason], [t0].[PredictionDate], [t0].[RecommendedAction], [t0].[RiskLevel], [t0].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT [a].[CustomerId]
    FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a]
    GROUP BY [a].[CustomerId]
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[Id], [t1].[ChurnScore], [t1].[CreatedAt], [t1].[CustomerId], [t1].[IsDeleted], [t1].[MainReason], [t1].[PredictionDate], [t1].[RecommendedAction], [t1].[RiskLevel], [t1].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM (
        SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[ChurnScore], [a0].[CreatedAt], [a0].[CustomerId], [a0].[IsDeleted], [a0].[MainReason], [a0].[PredictionDate], [a0].[RecommendedAction], [a0].[RiskLevel], [a0].[UpdatedAt], ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY [a0].[CustomerId] ORDER BY [a0].[PredictionDate] DESC) AS [row]
        FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a0]
    ) AS [t1]
    WHERE [t1].[row] <= 1
) AS [t0] ON [t].[CustomerId] = [t0].[CustomerId]

    ORDER BY [a].[PredictionDate] DESC
) AS [t]

FROM [Customers] AS [c]

2025-12-19 04:22:59.163 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t0].[Id], [t0].[ChurnScore], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CustomerId], [t0].[IsDeleted], [t0].[MainReason], [t0].[PredictionDate], [t0].[RecommendedAction], [t0].[RiskLevel], [t0].[UpdatedAt]
FROM (
    SELECT [a].[CustomerId]
    FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a]
    GROUP BY [a].[CustomerId]
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[Id], [t1].[ChurnScore], [t1].[CreatedAt], [t1].[CustomerId], [t1].[IsDeleted], [t1].[MainReason], [t1].[PredictionDate], [t1].[RecommendedAction], [t1].[RiskLevel], [t1].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM (
        SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[ChurnScore], [a0].[CreatedAt], [a0].[CustomerId], [a0].[IsDeleted], [a0].[MainReason], [a0].[PredictionDate], [a0].[RecommendedAction], [a0].[RiskLevel], [a0].[UpdatedAt], ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY [a0].[CustomerId] ORDER BY [a0].[PredictionDate] DESC) AS [row]
        FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a0]
    ) AS [t1]
    WHERE [t1].[row] <= 1
) AS [t0] ON [t].[CustomerId] = [t0].[CustomerId]
2025-12-19 04:22:59.172 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[CustomerId], [c].[Name], [t].[ChurnScore], [t].[RiskLevel], [t].[RecommendedAction], [t].[MainReason]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [a].[ChurnScore], [a].[CustomerId], [a].[MainReason], [a].[PredictionDate], [a].[RecommendedAction], [a].[RiskLevel]
    FROM [AiPredictionLogs] AS [a]
    ORDER BY [a].[PredictionDate] DESC
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Customers] AS [c] ON [t].[CustomerId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[PredictionDate] DESC
